column4: I need help getting my internal drive working :( I have my drive as /dev/sdb. I did: sudo mkfs.ext3 /dev/sdb then I added the following line to /etc/fstab: UUID=a0468ee7-dad6-4332-a777-61f9a04070f3       /monster        ext3    defaults 0 2. then i did sudo mount -a. but i get errors. what am i doing wrong?
mkfs.ext3 should be called on sdb1 not sdb
